B

BoundedHBaseClient - Class in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase
An HBaseClient that constrains the maximum number of concurrent asynchronous requests.
BoundedHBaseClient(HBaseClient, int) - Constructor for class com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.BoundedHBaseClient
Create a new instance with the given limit on concurrent requests for the given underlying HBaseClient implementation.
BoundedHBaseClient(HBaseClient, Semaphore) - Constructor for class com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.BoundedHBaseClient
Create a new instance with the given semaphore for the given underlying HBaseClient implementation.
